TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MetadataResolver extends System.Object
public ref class MetadataResolver abstract sealed

summary.span: 擷取及匯入做為 物件的中繼資料。

span.span: Retrieves and imports metadata as objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 類別，快速地從中繼資料匯入服務的端點。Use the class to quickly import endpoints for a service from metadata. 這個類別會下載中繼資料，並將它轉換為 物件。This class downloads and converts metadata into objects. 若要下載中繼資料並處理該資訊以做為 ，請參閱 。To download metadata and process that information as a , see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 類別，將中繼資料當做 物件集合傳回，接著用來連接至服務執行個體。The following code example shows the use of the class to return metadata as a collection of objects that are then used to connect to a service instance. [!code-csharp[MetadataResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/metadataresolver/cs/client.cs#1)] 下列程式碼範例會示範如何透過 HTTP GET 要求而非 WS-Transfer，使用 下載中繼資料並將中繼資料當做 物件集合傳回。The following code example shows the use of the to download and return metadata as a collection of objects using an HTTP GET request rather than WS-Transfer. [!code-csharp[MetadataResolver#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/metadataresolver/cs/client.cs#2)]

summary.span: 開始非同步呼叫，這個呼叫會將中繼資料位址解析成該服務的 物件集合。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous call that resolves a metadata address into a collection of objects for that service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些方法會開始 方法的非同步版本。These methods begin asynchronous versions of the methods.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous call that resolves a metadata address into the objects for the specified contracts, using the specified address and asynchronous state and delegate.
The that references the asynchronous resolve operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 上的預設值以擷取中繼資料，而預設的 則為 。The default settings on the are used to retrieve the metadata and the default is . 若要下載中繼資料，但不想將資訊解析成 物件，請直接使用 。To download metadata but not resolve the information into objects, use the directly. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有匯入端點，或者如果沒有符合合約的端點，則會傳回空集合。An empty collection is returned if no endpoints were imported or if no endpoints matched the contract. 如果傳回空集合，則會寫入警告追蹤。If an empty collection is returned, a warning trace is written.

exception.span: 位址、合約或回呼為 。

span.span: The address, contract, or callback is .

exception.span: 為空的、至少 的其中一個成員為 ，或者 包含一個以上同名且命名空間相同的合約。

span.span: is empty, at least one member of is , or contains more than one contract with the same name and namespace.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous call that resolves a metadata address into the objects for the specified contract using the specified address and asynchronous state and delegate.
The that references the asynchronous resolve operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 上的預設值以擷取中繼資料，而預設的 則為 。The default settings on the are used to retrieve the metadata and the default is . 若要下載中繼資料，但不想將資訊解析成 物件，請直接使用 。To download metadata but not resolve the information into objects, use the directly. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有匯入端點，或者如果沒有符合合約的端點，則會傳回空集合。An empty collection is returned if no endpoints were imported or if no endpoints matched the contract. 如果傳回空集合，則會寫入警告追蹤。If an empty collection is returned, a warning trace is written. 使用這個方法時，您需要指定合約類型。This method requires that you specify a contract type. 宣告服務介面在用戶端程式碼或使用 Svcutil.exe 產生 WCF 用戶端，您可以指定的合約。You can specify the contract by declaring the service interface in the client code or by using a WCF client generated by Svcutil.exe. 如果介面發生變更 （新增新的作業，例如） 您必須更新用戶端程式碼中的介面或產生新的 WCF 用戶端。If the interface changes (adding a new operation, for example) you must update the interface in the client code or generate a new WCF client. 如果沒有這樣做，則會擲回例外狀況。If you do not, an exception is thrown. 例如，您的服務會實作名為 ICalculator (定義 Add()、Sub()、Mult() 和 Div()) 的服務合約。For example, you have a service that implements a service contract called ICalculator that defines Add(), Sub(), Mult(), and Div(). 您建立用戶端應用程式，並產生 WCF 用戶端。You create a client application and generate WCF client. 接著將名為 Echo() 的方法加入至 ICalculator。You then add a method to ICalculator called Echo(). 如果接著撰寫呼叫的應用程式而不會產生新的 WCF 用戶端中，您收到下列例外狀況。If you then write an application that calls without generating a new WCF client you get the following exception. `Unhandled Exception: System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter+WsdlImportException: Cannot locate operation Echo in Contract ICalculator`。`Unhandled Exception: System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter+WsdlImportException: Cannot locate operation Echo in Contract ICalculator`.

exception.span: 位址、合約或回呼為 。

span.span: The address, contract, or callback is .

span.span: A collection of objects for the endpoints contained in the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結束其中一個 方法的非同步呼叫。Ends an asynchronous call to one of the methods.

summary.span: 下載中繼資料位址，並解析成該服務的 物件。

span.span: Downloads and resolves a metadata address into the objects for that service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要下載中繼資料，但不想將資訊解析成 物件，請直接使用 。To download metadata but not resolve the information into objects, use the directly. 針對所有同步和非同步 `Resolve` 方法，如果沒有匯入任何端點或者沒有符合合約的端點，則會傳回空集合。For all synchronous and asynchronous `Resolve` methods, an empty collection is returned if no endpoints were imported or if no endpoints matched the contract. 如果傳回空集合，則會寫入警告追蹤。If an empty collection is returned, a warning trace is written.

span.span: The contracts for which to download and resolve metadata.

param.name: address
param.span: 中繼資料的位址。

span.span: The metadata address.

summary.span: 針對指定位址的指定合約下載中繼資料位址，並解析成 物件集合。

span.span: Downloads and resolves a metadata address into a collection of objects for a specified contract at a specified address.

returns.span: 指定之合約的 物件集合。

span.span: A collection of objects for the specified contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法，指定下載及解析中繼資料時要使用的合約和中繼資料位址。Use the method to specify the contract and the metadata address to use when downloading and resolving metadata. 會使用 上的預設值以擷取中繼資料，而預設的 則為 。The default settings on the are used to retrieve the metadata and the default is . 若要下載中繼資料，但不想將資訊解析成 物件，請直接使用 。To download metadata but not resolve the information into objects, use the directly. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有匯入端點，或者如果沒有符合合約的端點，則會傳回空集合。An empty collection is returned if no endpoints were imported or if no endpoints matched the contract. 如果傳回空集合，則會寫入警告追蹤。If an empty collection is returned, a warning trace is written. 使用這個方法時，您需要指定合約類型。This method requires that you specify a contract type. 宣告服務介面在用戶端程式碼或使用 Svcutil.exe 產生 WCF 用戶端，您可以指定的合約。You can specify the contract by declaring the service interface in the client code or by using a WCF client generated by Svcutil.exe. 如果介面發生變更 （新增新的作業，例如） 您必須更新用戶端程式碼中的介面或產生新的 WCF 用戶端。If the interface changes (adding a new operation, for example) you must update the interface in the client code or generate a new WCF client. 如果沒有這樣做，則會擲回例外狀況。If you do not, an exception is thrown. 例如，您的服務會實作名為 ICalculator (定義 Add()、Sub()、Mult() 和 Div()) 的服務合約。For example, you have a service that implements a service contract called ICalculator that defines Add(), Sub(), Mult(), and Div(). 您建立用戶端應用程式，並產生 WCF 用戶端。You create a client application and generate WCF client. 接著將名為 Echo() 的方法加入至 ICalculator。You then add a method to ICalculator called Echo(). 如果接著撰寫呼叫的應用程式而不會產生新的 WCF 用戶端中，您收到下列例外狀況。If you then write an application that calls without generating a new WCF client you get the following exception. `Unhandled Exception: System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter+WsdlImportException: Cannot locate operation Echo in Contract ICalculator`。`Unhandled Exception: System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter+WsdlImportException: Cannot locate operation Echo in Contract ICalculator`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 類別，將中繼資料當做 物件集合傳回，接著用來連接至服務執行個體。The following code example shows the use of the class to return metadata as a collection of objects that are then used to connect to a service instance. [!code-csharp[MetadataResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/metadataresolver/cs/client.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的 是 。The default is . 若要下載中繼資料，但不想將資訊解析成 物件，請直接使用 。To download metadata but not resolve the information into objects, use the directly. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有匯入端點，或者如果沒有符合合約的端點，則會傳回空集合。An empty collection is returned if no endpoints were imported or if no endpoints matched the contract. 如果傳回空集合，則會寫入警告追蹤。If an empty collection is returned, a warning trace is written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法指定合約、位址和要使用的下載機制。Use the method to specify a contract, and address, and the download mechanism to use. 的預設值是用來擷取中繼資料。The default settings on the are used to retrieve the metadata. 若要下載中繼資料，但不想將資訊解析成 物件，請直接使用 。To download metadata but not resolve the information into objects, use the directly. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有匯入端點，或者如果沒有符合合約的端點，則會傳回空集合。An empty collection is returned if no endpoints were imported or if no endpoints matched the contract. 如果傳回空集合，則會寫入警告追蹤。If an empty collection is returned, a warning trace is written. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何透過 HTTP GET 要求而非 WS-Transfer，使用 下載中繼資料並將中繼資料當做 物件集合傳回。The following code example shows the use of the to download and return metadata as a collection of objects using an HTTP GET request rather than WS-Transfer.
